```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidycensus)
library(tidyverse)
```
```{r harris}
racevars <- c(White = "B02001_002", 
              Black = "B02001_003", 
              Asian = "B02001_005",
              Hispanic = "B03003_003")
harris <- get_acs(geography = "tract",
                  variables = racevars, 
                  year = 2018,
                  state = "TX",
                  county = "Harris County",
                  geometry = TRUE,
                  summary_var = "B02001_001")
glimpse(harris)
```
